title: Best Team Drafts, Packers late WR picks, Mayfield options, Nate Burleson, and Honey Badger news!
itunes:title: Best Team Drafts, Packers late WR picks, Mayfield options, Nate Burleson, and Honey Badger news!
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with a complete recap of the 2022 NFL Draft.  Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara discuss the teams that had the best overall picks. The table looks at individual players that are set up to succeed with their new teams before turning attention to the nine QB's that were selected.  The Packers finally took a WR late, but can he immediately produce on the field?  Kyle thinks the Seahawks should be interested in Baker Mayfield, but wonders why there's not any support around the league for the QB.  Nate Burleson drops by to talk Draft and Kyle's pick for the Bills.  Plus, we get breaking news on Tyrann Mathieu to the Saints.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: Sports, NFL, Football, NFL Draft, Good Morning Football, Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, Shaun O'Hara, Philadelphia Eagles, New York Jets, Buffalo Bills, Kyle Hamilton, Skyy Moore, Kair Elam, Kenny Pickett, Pittsburgh Steelers, Desmond Ridder, Matt Corral, Malik Willis, Green Bay Packers, Seattle Seahawks, Baker Mayfield, Pete Carroll, Drew Lock, Geno Smith, Nate Burleson, Aidan Hutchinson, Detroit Lions, Sam Prince, New Orleans Saints, Tyrann Mathieu, Honey Badger
